description: 'Season of Sun' in English. Tourists flock for their famous coconut coffee and cold-pressed citrus espresso. {D:A1,W:LW,w:FRW,P:PerlinNoise,p:CW,mesh:2}

events.description: Linh opens the shutters, Bao preps the beans, Thao & Minh arrive with sleepy hellos.
Tourists grabbing coconut coffee before tours. Lots of smiles and takeout cups.
Linh or Bao teaches guests how to brew Vietnamese coffee. Photos, laughs, souvenir aprons.
Quiet time. Bao experiments with new syrups. Thao sketches. Minh DJs the playlist.
The cafÃ© fills again. Golden hour glow, iced citrus coffee flowing.
Fans slow, music softer. Locals drop by. Bao closes the grinder with care.
Extra batch of coconut cream, Linh offers secret iced coconut shot. Popular with backpackers.
